Rewards Rate: 3 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent & 6 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on hotels, Airlines, Bus bookings, etc. You can save up to 1.5% using this card.
Domestic Lounge Access: Complimentary domestic lounge access to selected lounges in India.
Insurance Benefits: You get an air accident insurance coverage worth Rs. 25 lakhs.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off if you spend Rs. 1,50,000 or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for all transactions between Rs. 400 & Rs. 5,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash withdrawn or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: You get 3 Delight Points on every Rs. 100 you spend using your IDBI Euphoria World Credit Card.
You get 6 Delight Points on every Rs. 100 you spend on Airline/hotel bookings/ Bus bookings/ IRCTC, etc.
1% fuel surcharge waiver up to Rs. 500 per month.
